wikipedia_page.main: Anthony John Lawrence, OBE (12 August 1912 – 24 September 2013) was a British journalist. His most high-profile role was that of chief Far East correspondent for BBC Radio during the Vietnam War. He died in Hong Kong on 24 September 2013.

response: *  2013   – Anthony Lawrence, English-Hong Kong journalist and author (b. 1912)

response: * Anthony Lawrence (judge) (born 1965), American judge on the Mississippi Court of Appeals
